messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

ms dashboard snow widget alteration dashboard snow widget alteration hello snow dashboard amendments regarding complaints split per complaint drivers number tickets logged complaints updates accordingly split per resolution category kindly log assign analysis further information assistance let thank care
